name: iron-barbs

effect.sword-shield: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.the-crown-tundra: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.legends-arceus: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.

short_effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact with iron barbs.
